channel.title: [*NEW*] Lean Pkz PK/Skill/Boss/ETC. Server! Welcome! [WEBCLIENT]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1zd9a2w.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/i3e2ok.png[/img] [url=http://leanpkz.webs.com/]LeanPkz Forums[/url]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/4lhqmt.png[/img] [url=http://leanpkz.webs.com/webclient]Play Now![/url]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zoavww.gif[/img] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/3nxyyi9b1tk548f/LeanPkz%20Client.rar]LeanPkz Client Download[/url]
[color=blue][b]LEANPKZ IS BACK![/b][/color]
- We are happy to say we are back up and running ! - We will be having an apropritate ammount of drop partys. - We will be looking for some new staff/mods, and Trusted Users. - Our staff works hard to satisfy the players and give you a fun gaming environment! - Also, We will always be making new updates! Alot will be based on player suggestions.
IF, you would like to join the staff team, please don't kiss ass. You must be mature, and interested in helping LeanPkz. Get to know us! -Bret & Colby
- Great Economy!! - All working mini-games, we have multiple. - All unique areas for everything with some cool unique features. - All skills working including summoning and hunter, with Skill Teleports! - Torva, Pernix, Virtus, And More!
- Donator zone in Armours tab, Unique with Portals for special zones. - Korasi, D clawz, sol, chaotics, - All spirit sheilds with working effects - Fully working fun pk with no bugs/glitches - Nice item switching for bridding - Slayer shop with rewards ! - 2 pkp shops - Vote points shop! - Primal, dung armours ! - Fully working curses! - Donator tab allowing you to switch spellbooks at anytime, - Tormented demons, Barrelchest, Nomad, Daggonath kings, Corp beast! - Frost dragons! - Giant mole and Kalphite queen!
[b]View the pictures below for a better perspective :)[/b]
Working Hunter and Agility! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/seozlt.jpg[/img]
Commands! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/95obi8.jpg[/img]
Thieve at the NEW home to make money! Also Fun Pk Portal! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/aew45l.jpg[/img]
Working Specs and Great Combat! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2uo6pvb.jpg[/img]
Working Turmoil! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2w4bqtk.jpg[/img]
Pk Points Shop! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/27zm51y.jpg[/img]
Summoning! [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/tandeh.jpg[/img][/CENTER]

item.description:
@forever-rune wrote:

[CENTER]

Play Now!

LeanPkz Client Download

[color=blue]LEANPKZ IS BACK![/color]

  • We are happy to say we are back up and running !
  • We will be having an apropritate ammount of drop partys.
  • We will be looking for some new staff/mods, and Trusted Users.
  • Our staff works hard to satisfy the players and give you a fun gaming environment!
  • Also, We will always be making new updates! Alot will be based on player suggestions.

IF, you would like to join the staff team, please don’t kiss ass. You must be mature, and interested
in helping LeanPkz. Get to know us! -Bret & Colby

  • Great Economy!!

  • All working mini-games, we have multiple.

  • All unique areas for everything with some cool unique features.

  • All skills working including summoning and hunter, with Skill Teleports!

  • Torva, Pernix, Virtus, And More!

  • Donator zone in Armours tab, Unique with Portals for special zones.

  • Korasi, D clawz, sol, chaotics,

  • All spirit sheilds with working effects

  • Fully working fun pk with no bugs/glitches

  • Nice item switching for bridding

  • Slayer shop with rewards !

  • 2 pkp shops

  • Vote points shop!

  • Primal, dung armours !

  • Fully working curses!

  • Donator tab allowing you to switch spellbooks at anytime,

  • Tormented demons, Barrelchest, Nomad, Daggonath kings, Corp beast!

  • Frost dragons!

  • Giant mole and Kalphite queen!
